import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, AccordionCollapse } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../stylesheets/Signup.css'; import axios from 'axios'; let username = ''; let password = ''; let age = null; let email = ''; let firstName = ''; let lastName = ''; export default class Signup extends Component { signupRequest= () => { var encodedURI = window.encodeURI(this.props.uri); console.log('Username', username, 'Password', password) return axios.post(encodedURI, { username: username, password: password, lastName: lastName, firstName: firstName, email: email, age: age }) } render() { return (
firstName = event.target.value}/> lastName = event.target.value}/> email = event.target.value}> username = event.target.value}> password = event.target.value}> age = event.target.value}>
) } }
